location.title: Meesha Hantida
location.description: Hantidaaga meesha ku jirtaa? Tani waxay ka caawisaa martida inay ku helaan.
location.coordinatesHelp: Waxaad bixi kartaa iskudhaf sax ah si aad u hagaajiso saxitaanka meesha.

location.invalidLongitude: Longitude waa in uu ahaadaa u dhexeysa -180 iyo 180
location.privacyNote: Cinwaankaaga saxda ah waxaa la wadaagi doonaa martida la xaqiijiyay kaliya. Meel guud ayaa la muujin doonaa martida ku raadinta hantida.
location.confirmTitle: Miyay tani tahay meesha saxda ah?
location.confirmDescription: Hubi in pin-ka uu ku jiro meesha saxda ah. Waxaad beddeli kartaa hadday u baahan tahay.
location.locationHelp: Meesha saxda ah ayaa ka caawiya martida inay helaan hantidaaga si fudud
location.mapInstructions: Jiid pin-ka si aad u beddesho meeshaaga saxda ah
location.locationAccuracyHelp: Meesho sax ah ayaa keena buuking wanaagsan

intro.title: Ku soo dhowow Liiska Hantida
intro.description: Waxaan kugu hanqal qaadi doonaa liiska hantidaaga talaabooyin fudud oo keliya.
intro.benefit3: Hel lacag degdeg ah oo amni ah
intro.infoText: Waxaad kaydi kartaa horumarintaaga waqtiga kasta waxaadna dib u noqon kartaa dambe. Host-yada badan waxay dhammeeyaan liiskooda 15 daqiiqo gudahood.

intro.title: Aan bilowno
intro.description: Waxaan kugu hanqal qaadi doonaa liiska hantidaaga talaabooyin fudud oo keliya. Waxaad kaydi kartaa oo ka bax kartaa waqtiga kasta.
benefits: Hel lacag degdeg ah oo amni ah

guestAccess.title: Waxa martidu heli doonaan?
guestAccess.description: U sheeg martida meelaha ay isticmaali karaan
guestAccess.entirePlaceDesc: Martida waxay leeyihiin hantida oo dhan
guestAccess.privateRoomDesc: Martida waxay leeyihiin qol gaar ah, laakiin waxay wadaagi karaan meelaha guud
guestAccess.sharedRoomDesc: Martida waxay wadaagi karaan qol kale
guestAccess.accessHelp: Ahaa cad ku saabsan waxa martidu heli karaan si aad uga hortagto faham la'aan

amenities.title: Waxa adeegyada aad bixisay?
amenities.tipContent: Dooro adeegyada si sax ah u sharaxa hantidaaga. Martida waxay qiimeeyaan macluumaad faahfaahsan oo ku saabsan waxa la heli karo.
amenities.selectAtLeastOne: Fadlan dooro ugu yaraan hal adeeg

photos.title: Ku dar sawirrada hantidaaga
photos.description: Soo deji ugu yaraan 5 sawir. Midka ugu horreeya ayaa noqon doona sawirkaaga daboobka.
tips: Isticmaal iftiin dabiici hadday suurtagal tahay
Ku dar meelaha kala duwan ee meeshaaga
Hay sawirrada cusub oo sax ah
photos.dragDrop: Jiid oo ku dhic sawirrada halkan
photos.minRequired: Ugu yaraan 5 sawir ayaa loo baahan yahay
photos.cameraRollPermission: Ogolaanshaha library-ga sawirrada ayaa loo baahan yahay si la dooro sawirrada
photos.cameraPermission: Ogolaanshaha kamarada ayaa loo baahan yahay si la qaado sawirrada
photos.tipContent: Sawir tayo sare leh ayaa muhiim u ah soo jiidashada martida. Hubi in sawirradaaga ay iftiin fiican ku hayaan oo muujiyaan aasaaska ugu fiican ee hantidaaga.
photos.photoQualityHelp: Sawir tayo sare leh ayaa kordhiya heerka buukingka
photos.photoLimit: Ugu badan 20 sawir ayaa la oggolaan yahay
photos.photoSizeLimit: Cabbirka sawirka waa in uu ahaadaa ka yar 10MB

review.title: Dib u Eeg & Daabici
review.description: Eeg dhammeys ka hor inta aadan daabicin liiskaaga

review.publishMessage: Hantidaaga waxaa la dib u eegi doonaa waxaana la daabici doonaa 24 saacadood gudahood. Waxaad tafatiri kartaa faahfaahintan dambe ka dib daabista.

success.title: Hambalyo!

success.publishedMessage: Hantidaaga hadda waa firfircoon oo martida ku arki karaan. Waxaad tafatiri kartaa waqtiga kasta dashboard-kaaga.
success.draftMessage: Hantidaaga waxaa la kaydiyay sida qoraal. Waxaad sii wadi kartaa tafatirka dambe.

currencyInfo.description: Doorashadaaga lacagta waxaa la isticmaali doonaa app-ka oo dhan si loo muujiyo qiimaha iyo lacag bixinta. Waxaad beddeli kartaa waqtiga kasta.

languageInfo.title: Macluumaadka Luuqadda
languageInfo.description: Dooro luuqadda aad rabto interface-ka app-ka. Tani waxay beddeli doontaa dhammaan qoraalka iyo fariinaha luuqadda aad dooratay.

themeInfo.title: Macluumaadka Theme-ka
themeInfo.description: Dooro sida app-ka u muuqda. Nidaamka wuxuu raaci doonaa dejinta theme-ka qalabkaaga.

personalInfoForm.title: Macluumaadka Shakhsi ah
personalInfoForm.description: Cusboonaysii faahfaahintaaga shakhsi ah iyo macluumaadka xiriirka

helpCenterInfo.description: Hel jawaabo su'aalaha inta badan la isweydiiyo oo hel taageero isticmaalka app-ka.

feedbackInfo.title: Si Feedback
feedbackInfo.description: Waxaan jeclaan lahayn inaan kaaga maqalno! Wadaag fikradaaga, talooyinka, ama sheeg dhibaatooyin aad la kulantay.

termsInfo.title: Shuruudaha Adeegga
termsInfo.description: Akhri shuruudaha iyo xaaladaha ayaa maamula isticmaalkaaga app-ka.
